title: Bug 110566 - Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression for row[0]
description: When setting a filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0', the data set returns the wrong result or just returns a null result set.
OB: When setting a filter expression for the data set using 'row[0] equals to '
EB: An error message should pop up indicating that an invalid filter expression has been used.
SR:
1. Set a filter expression for the data set using 'row[0] equals to '
2. Click on the Preview tab

Expected Result: An error message should pop up indicating that an invalid filter expression has been used.
